author: hwright
msg: Add a libsvn_wc API to fetch the children of a node back into the client.
This is one of our testing-the-waters APIs to help determine what information
Use this API in place of svn_wc_entries_read(), in an effort to remove an
(Note: this has a negative performance impact, since get_entry() will
actually re-read the all the entries everytime it is called.  However,
eventually we won't be working with entries at all, and the performance hit
(copy_versioned_files): Use svn_wc__node_get_children() to iterate over the
children of a directory, and remove the now-obsolete access baton.

author: hwright
msg: * only work with absolute paths (except where noted)
* directly fetch entries, instead of using an access baton
* use an iterpool to improve memory usage

author: hwright
msg: Wrap a few errors to assist in stack-trace debugging.
